explains: n. 继承者，接替的事物；（组织、机器等的）接替物
wordGroup: legal successor 法定继承人；合法继承人

sentences.en: Sokagakkai was able to handpick his successor.
sentences.cn: 苏卡格凯可以亲自挑选他的继承人。

sentences.en: Mr. Olsen has always avoided anointing any successor.
sentences.cn: 奥尔森先生总是避免指定任何继任者。

sentences.en: He was deposed and replaced by a more pliant successor.
sentences.cn: 他被赶下台，由一个比较容易摆布的继任者取代。
